name: Airship
description: A collection of loosely coupled but interoperable tools that declaratively automate cloud provisioning.

name: Azimuth
description: Azimuth provides a self-service portal for managing HPC and AI workloads based on a simplified version of the OpenStack Horizon.

name: Ceph
description: A software-defined storage platform, often used in open infrastructure deployments to provide scalable block storage for OpenStack and others.

name: DPDK
description: A set of user-space libraries and drivers that accelerate packet-processing workloads.

name: Exosphere
description: Provides a user-friendly interface for non-proprietary cloud infrastructure.

name: Kata Containers
description: A container runtime with lightweight virtual machines that feel and perform like containers, but provide stronger workload isolation.

name: Kubernetes
description: An orchestration platform for containerized applications that runs on top of programmable infrastructure and key component of the LOKI stack.

name: openEuler
description: An operating system compatible with multiple computing architectures with a very active OpenStack SIG.

name: OpenStack
description: The combination of compute, network and storage resources providing the cloud infrastructure for public, private and hybrid clouds, and a key component of the LOKI stack.

name: Sovereign Cloud Stack
description: A network of standardized sovereign cloud and container infrastructure providers defining, implementing and operating a fully open, federated, compatible platform.

name: StarlingX
description: A complete cloud infrastructure software stack for distributed systems created for ultra-low latency use cases.

name: Yaook
description: Yaook is a lifecycle management tool for OpenStack hosted by ALASCA, using Kubernetes to automate provisioning, monitoring, and updating. Yaook manages bare metal, Kubernetes, and OpenStack.

name: Zuul
description: A program that drives continuous integration, delivery, and deployment systems with a focus on project gating.
